resources.string: • Rentals are for a period of one (1) semester. \\n• You must provide your own lock. \\n• Rates are not pro-rated. \\n• The خَزْنَتِي is not responsible for any damage, theft or vandalism that may occur to the locker and/or its contents. \\n• Lockers must be cleaned out at the end of each rental period (by the last day of final exams). Any contents remaining in the locker at the end of the semester will be disposed of. \\n• No stickers, decals or markings of any kind are permitted on, or in, any locker. Any evidence of such will result in forfeiture of the locker and a possible fine. \\n• Locks illegally placed on a locker will be removed and the contents disposed of. \\n• Lockers are the property of خَزْنَتِي and as such, خَزْنَتِي reserves the right to remove the lock and the contents of any locker.
